short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Comprehensive Costa Rica mapping - for conservationists, government officials, realtors, developers, surveyors, and property owners.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The best solution for online mapping in Costa Rica. MapaTica ntegrates with SIRI and adds features to make it easier to research properties. 

* Cleaned up and more usable interface
* Enable property selection
* Allow KML Export
* Start at current location
* Search by GPS coordinates, property id
* Overlay useful layers (terrain, water, roads, satellite, etc)
* Touchscreen controls (zoom, pan)
